text: Anante Heroti'a Tairi kumate vahe'ene, Saito kumate vahe'mokizmigura arimpa ahezamantege'za, zamagra mago zamarimpa hu'za agrite emeri atru hu'za, kini ne'mofo tva'onte eri'za ne' Blastusi, zamaza hinogu rimpa azeri fru hute'za, knare nomanizama kini ne'mo'ma zamisigu antahige'naze. Na'ankure zamagrama kave'ma e'nerizana kini Heroti'ma kava kri'nea mopafinti e'neri'ze.
